channel.title: CVE Feed for Forcepoint -- Cloud Security Gateway (CSG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Forcepoint -- Cloud Security Gateway (CSG)

item.title: CVE-2023-2080|2023-06-15T22:18:58.058Z -- forcepoint -- cloud%20security%20gateway%20%28csg%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Forcepoint Cloud Security Gateway (CSG) Portal on Web Cloud Security Gateway, Email Security Cloud allows Blind SQL Injection.
